lines: This semester you must decide where you would like to live now that you are in college.
#LIVE ON CAMPUS IN ONE OF THE DORMITORIES

You are assigned a roommate named Tony Castano. Although he seems like a nice enough person, he is extremely sloppy, is prone to turning his stereo up very loud, and spends most of his time seeking out and ingesting federally-controlled
substances. When you ask what his major is, he replies
"Physics -- I'm taking up time and space!" Does this seem like someone you can live with?
The two of you must be well suited for each other. You must be a Physics major, too.
I'm sorry, there are no other room assignments available right now. You'll just have to see if you can work it out.

You are assigned a roommate named Tony Castano. When you walk into the room, a beautiful, shapely brunette walks out of the bathroom wrapped in just a towel. Her name is TONI Castano. Looks like the people who assign rooms made a bit
of a mistake. Toni is the free-spirited type. She says she is willing to make the best of it if you are. Would you like to try
Do you think you would like to try anything romantic with her?

I don't blame you, she is a FOX. However, she is not that type of fox. She is madly in love with a tennis pro who travels around the world and calls her about once a month. Be prepared to take a lot of cold showers.
I could understand trying to maintain that type of boundary with someone you hardly know and with whom you have to live. The two of you should get along just fine.

Maybe you feel that it would be too risky to room with someone who looks like Toni. Maybe the temptations would be too great. If her current style of (un)dress is any indication of her typical lounging attire, you would
probably not be able to stand the frequent cold showers.
